attributes.title: To Donald the Orange:

attributes.title: Worst app ever
attributes.review: Don't download this app unless you like to be fed lies. You don’t need a app to be a president and that’s not where your focus should be he should be focused to the people

attributes.title: just don’t
attributes.review: i downloaded this app and then my phone started geeking out??? like photos were being deleted, my info started t get leaked and then donald trump started popping up all over my phone?!?!??!!!! i don’t want this man on my phone i thought this was the new tiktok?!?! guys what do i do? it’s broke

attributes.title: It was a bad experience
attributes.review: I was very uncomfortable with the energy it produced and I felt as though it was trying to take over my life and honestly, my children were completely suffering. Also do you realize that you have muffins in the freezer on this app🤢who does that? Don’t even bother fixing it at this point you’ve ruined the whole experience🙄

attributes.title: Trump you are wrong
attributes.review: I tried to see what is trump’s plan were me already knowing how I feel about him being the hateful person he is no I normally don’t leave reviews but trump is petty and terrible for what he has done.

attributes.title: BAD APP
attributes.review:
This app is very very bad. It is terrible quality and it needs to be removed from the App Store, just like trump. Please take it down. Do not get this app. Thanks

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: donald trump himself hacked into my iphone camera since i downloaded this and said he liked my prepubescent body he’s a pedo don’t download and don’t vote trump💓

Story time: so basically I opened the app and I was greeted with literal fruit. Like an ORANGE was in my screen 😐. They kept asking me for my number and considering the orange already has 43 sexual assault accusations.... I disrespectfully declined 💅... Anyways if you’re reading this and genuinely support him and everything to the point where u are downloading the campaign app then... goodluck supporting someone who sexualizes their daughter and literally every moving object. Also not to mention the policies he has put in place to support corporatism. Don’t forget about him failing to mention the injustices in his country that he’s trying to make “great again” but ok queen 😐
